Package libfov

Interface Summary
IFovFunctions An interface for functions that test opacity and apply lighting
 

Class Summary
LibFov This is a Java port of C library which implements a course-grained lighting algorithm suitable for tile-based games such as roguelikes.
Settings A class that contains all the settings for the libFov
 

Enum Summary
Settings.CornerPeekType Values for the corner peek setting.
Settings.DirectionType Eight-way directions.
Settings.OpaqueApplyType Values for the opaque apply setting.
Settings.ShapeType Values for the shape setting.
